ygData.subject: Skull of Jhen'Tra Information
ygData.msgSnippet: Brothers and Sisters, As part of the Purple Headband quest, I recently was able to acquire Zaharn s Coronet from within Permafrost.  I ve been holding the
ygData.messageBody:
Brothers and Sisters,

As part of the Purple Headband quest, I recently was able to acquire Zaharn's Coronet from within Permafrost. I've been holding the Dagger of Marnek for some time now, just waiting for the day when I could obtain the coronet (it being the hardest item of the 3 to get). Now I am left with needing the final component, the Skull of Jhen'Tra. At first I auctioned for one, not sure if I had the energy to adventure to a strange land and attempt to find it. But now I think that I shall!

Does anyone have any tips on this mob (Which Gnoll Embalmer? Level needed?) and it's resident zone (Lake Rathe?).

Any information would be greatly appreciated.



--
Ezhar Montenegro
Proud Member of the Platinum Sphere Guild
http://www.platinumsphere.com
--
